forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
